title: Fallen
text: In this lithograph a mother reacts to the news that a loved one has been killed in action. Her children run to comfort her and in turn react to her immense grief and agony.
description: woman with hands grasping her head, surrounded by 4 clinging children
creditline: The Estate of Charles J. Winton and Henrietta McDonald Winton
